articles.author: Katrina Kaufman, Jennifer Jacobs
articles.title: Kari Lake says she has no intention of turning Voice of America into "Trump TV" - CBS News
articles.description: Kari Lake, a former broadcast journalist who unsuccessfully ran for governor and for a U.S. Senate seat in Arizona, is President-elect Donald Trump's selection to lead Voice of America.
articles.content:
Kari Lake said it's not her intention to turn the government-funded news outlet Voice of America into "MAGA TV," but that she wants to see a return of politically neutral journalism.

articles.author: Gregory Korte
articles.title: Millions to Get Bigger Social Security Checks If Biden Signs New Bill - Bloomberg
articles.description: Millions of Americans may see their Social Security benefits increase under a bill headed to President Joe Biden’s desk — though critics warn that the measure comes at the cost of pushing the fund further toward insolvency.
